---
title: "Installation"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```
Set the global options to find your julia binary installation
```{r setup, eval = FALSE}
options("JULIA_HOME" = "/home/bkopper/julia-1.8.2/bin")
```
Load JuliaCall and set it up:
```{r setup2, eval = FALSE}
library(JuliaCall)
julia_setup()
```
Install the julia module `Diversification.jl`:
```{r install, eval = FALSE}
julia_install_package("https://github.com/kopperud/Diversification")
```
